name: downloadArtifact
description: Downloads a cache artifact indentified by its `hash` specified on the request path. The artifact is downloaded as an octet-stream. The client should verify the content-length header and response body.

x-artifact-client-ci.description: The continuous integration or delivery environment where this artifact is downloaded.

x-artifact-client-interactive.description: 1 if the client is an interactive shell. Otherwise 0

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.
